name: The 2018 International Conference on Signal Processing and Machine Learning SPML 2018
content: Conference official website：http://www.spml.net/ Meeting time：November 28-30, 2018\. Meeting place：Shanghai, China. Host unit：ACM Singapore Chapter. keynote speaker： Prof. Chin-Chen Chang - (IEEE fellow) from Feng Chia University, Taiwan. Prof. Shigeru Katagiri - (IEEE fellow) from Doshisha University, Japan. Published by： Accepted papers will be published into International Conference Proceedings, which is indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, Inspec etc. Call for Papers： Time-frequency analysis. Nonlinear signal processing. Nonstationary signal processing. Adaptive signal processing. Biomedical signal and image processing. Signal transforms. Multirate signal processing. Machine learning methods. Feature extractions. Support vector machines (SVM). Least-squares SVM (LS-SVM). Twin SVM (TWSVM). Important Dates Deadline (full text) : July 25, 2018\. Deadline (abstract) : August 15, 2018\. Registration Deadline: August 31, 2018\. Conference Contact :Ms. Lisa Wang. mailbox: spml.contact@gmail.com. Tel: +86-021-59561560.
